QuestData.Title: Cold Welcome
QuestData.Description: Many of the survivors made their way down into Glimmerdeep Gorge to help with the clam diving. We've been receiving reports back of deliberate attacks from some kind of murlocs down there.$B$BThe Admiral has to stay here as more men report in from the shell, so I'm having trouble convincing him to get any significant muscle to help the divers. If you'd be up for it, I'm certain they could use your help.$B$BCome back and let me know if you get the situation under control.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let me know if you get things taken care of down there. We're stretched pretty thin and I'm getting worried about the safety of the divers.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for stepping up to take care of this, $c. I know there are a lot of concerns swarming us right now, but maintaining the safety of the survivors is paramount.
